Name: IIS - Configure Compression
Description: Configures the MIME types used in static and dynamic compression e.g. The application/json MIME type can be configured to be served using GZIP compression.
Author: RehanSaeed

Parameters.Name: StaticMimeTypes
Parameters.Label: Static Compression MIME Types
Parameters.HelpText: The MIME types to be added for static compression separated by commas. Example: _application/json,application/xml_

Parameters.Name: DynamicMimeTypes
Parameters.Label: Dynamic Compression MIME Types
Parameters.HelpText: The MIME types to be added for dynamic compression separated by commas. Example: _application/json,application/xml_
